content.description:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. Each time it is your turn to write, you will have 90 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. Type your response in the target language. 

You will have a conversation with Yumi Watanabe, a classmate, about your group presentation on Japanese culture.
content.question:
Respond.
おもしろい発表になりそうね。じゃ、練習なんだけど、いつ、どこで、何時に会おうか。

frqParts.text:
Respond.
おもしろい発表になりそうね。じゃ、練習なんだけど、いつ、どこで、何時に会おうか。

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
